pattern.name: Integral
pattern.description:
The integral (area under curve) is computed with the trapezoidal rule as described at: http://www.lexjansen.com/wuss/2004/posters/c_post_the_sas_calculations_.pdf
Note: PostgreSQL returns dislikes calculation of (time with time zone - time with time zone).
Note: Does not work in older MySQL databases...
Note: Keyword dateToNumber is automatically replaced with database specific function.
pattern.example: Civilisation's score from Civilization III (a computer game).
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: WITH intermediate AS ( SELECT @base , @numericalColumn nowValue , dateToNumber(@temporalColumn) nowTime , LAG(@numericalColumn) OVER (PARTITION BY @basePartitionBy ORDER BY @temporalColumn) AS lagValue , LAG(dateToNumber(@temporalColumn)) OVER (PARTITION BY @basePartitionBy ORDER BY @temporalColumn) AS lagTime FROM @propagatedTable ) SELECT @base , sum((nowValue + lagValue) * (nowTime - lagTime) / 2) AS @columnName FROM intermediate GROUP BY @base
